name: Baffin Escalate Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
description: Brush aside a long, cold winter with tall, warm boots. From Baffin's Ease series, these lightweight boots slip on and off easily. They keep the sub-zero cold out too.Waterproof-breathable nylon upper with drawstring snow collar to shut flakes out.High-loft synthetic insulation to keep feet warm to -30°C.Removable plush footbed offers comfort.1-piece EVA midsole and rubber outsole for grip and durability.
